snippet: Canada's Alex Harvey surged past Norway's Martin Johnsrud Sundby going into the final bend to score a stunning victory in the men's 50km mass start, the final race of the Nordic World Ski Championships on Sunday....

headline.main: Canadian Skier Harvey Wins World Cross-Country Gold in 50k
headline.print_headline: Canadian Skier Harvey Wins World Cross-Country Gold in 50k

lead_paragraph: Canada's Alex Harvey surged past Norway's Martin Johnsrud Sundby going into the final bend to score a stunning victory in the men's 50km mass start, the final race of the Nordic World Ski Championships on Sunday.
